Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Green, Orange, & Pink Line trains are experiencing delays due to loss of power near Adams/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green, Orange, & Pink Line trains are experiencing delays due to loss of power near Adams/Wabash.

On the Orange Line, shuttle buses are available between Halsted and Library to provide connecting service. At this time Orange Line trains have been rerouted to the outer Loop (Brown Line Side).

On the Green Line shuttle buses are available between 35th-Bronzeville and Adams/Wabash to provide connecting service. At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted, #108 Halsted/95th Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/112th
ShortDescription: SB 8A South Halsted and 108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 111th, Green, 112th, and Halsted due to street blockage near Halsted/112th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8A South Halsted and #108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 111th, Green, 112th, and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/112th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
